messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Math and Unschoolers(1940's house) was voice was res...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/8/2002 7:42:41 AM Central Standard Time, ... I saw it!  Wasn t that family very likeable?  Those boys were just as sweet as they could
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/8/2002 7:42:41 AM Central Standard Time,
meembeam@... writes:

> did anyone see the 1940's house? the 10yob was made the fuel warden. He
> had to calculate how much energy different items used (mainly lights) and
> ways to conserve.
>

I saw it! Wasn't that family very likeable? Those boys were just as sweet
as they could be.

We made all kinds of connections. Will remembered the Blitz from Peter Pan
II. He described everything to his friend Estee, whose father is British and
who spent time in England this summer. Great show.

Tuck


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
